hadiths.text: Al Bara’ said “When the Prophet (ﷺ) fought the polytheists in the battle of Hunain, they (the Muslims) retreated, he (the Prophet) came down from his mule and walked on foot

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الرَّجُلِ يَتَرَجَّلُ عِنْدَ اللِّقَاءِ
chapter.eng-name: Regarding A Man Walking During The Encounter
